The Bone Snatcher is about a group miners who go on a search for a missing crew of miners in the Namib Desert. When the find them, the crew are found in an area with spikes with electric wires going all over and around them capturing them and setting them up so they can not possible move to safety.
If they do they will cut them on the edges of electric wires and kill them. So once they have moved them closer sand pails are placed around them

What is left of Planet Earth is populated by a few poor and starving rag-tag survivors. They must eat bugs and insects, or whatever they can find. The wealthy fliers have long since left Planet Earth, for adventures in the Saved Galaxy. They left behind the stowaway brilliant inventor (Spankalu). He designed and built 'The Mine Counter Miner' (T.M.C. Mimer), a machine to mine and remove the radioactive mine counter

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is going to be criticized by some because it has very little action in it, which is somewhat true. However there are some very funny moments here and some really entertaining scenes and it is acted well enough that you can suspend disbelief and enjoy it for what it is, a humorous excursion.
